phpprofiler.openfile.title: Open Profile File (Xdebug Profiling Output)
phpprofiler.hotpath.treshold.desc: (`0`..`100`) Value specifies minimum time (_in percent_) so the line in source code will be highlighted as hot-path.
capabilities.virtualWorkspaces.descripti: Virtual workspaces are supported as long as you can open a remote file.
capabilities.untrustedWorkspaces.descrip: All functionality is enabled as long as you can open a remote file.
